title: Ormosisdotcom
author: Ormosisdotcom
content: This service is offered by Ormosis.comIntroducing our social media verification service.Having your social media accounts verified might open up a world of opportunities for you. Unfortunately, verification requirements are very strict. Social media platforms have become more demanding and exclusive over time. For this reason, applying to get your profile verified without a social media agency is nearly impossible.Although there are still requirements in place, we are able to drastically improve your chances of getting the blue verification badge on your pages. We can achieve this by applying through the same media portal used by famous artists, companies, and politicians. To further improve your odds, we can provide media coverage and other exclusive services.The best part? You only pay for successful verifications. In the event that we are unable to complete the service, you will receive a full refund. This is a service geared towards strong budgets and requires a deposit. We accept any trusted escrow or middleman as long as the buyer covers all fees.There are 7 reasons why you should get verified.It builds social proof. With the proper conversion funnel, social proof quickly turns into new visitors, customers and sales.It protects your brand identity. The verification checkmark is not just a pretty badge. It’s common for professionals and influencers to have impersonators. Having a verified profile can easily show everyone you are the real one.Pop-out in searches and comments. You will not think twice before clicking a verified profile when they comment on your posts, videos or tweets.Increase brand awareness. With companies multiplying by the day, establishing a strong brand awareness is essential to be recognized and stand out amongst the crowd.Get access to exclusive benefits. Companies such as Twitter and Spotify give verified creators access to additional analytics. New features and beta invites are usually rolled out to established profiles before anyone else.Build trust between you and your followers. It’s easy for someone to pretend they are Brad Pitt’s new official profile and buy a few thousand fake followers. Internet users are aware of this and are constantly looking for clues that establish trust and give them the peace of mind and control they would have when talking with someone in person.It shows that your account is of interest to the public. This can open many doors to artists, freelancers and companies. People and businesses will most likely be more willing to contact you and collaborate with you once you are verified.-We support all the most popular platforms. Instagram Verification Service: $499 (Minimum deposit)Facebook Verification Service: $499 (Minimum deposit)TikTok Verification Service: $999 (Minimum deposit)Twitter Verification Service: $999 (Minimum deposit)Spotify Verification Service: $199 (Minimum deposit)YouTube Verification Service: $199 (Minimum deposit)Telegram Verification Service: $299 (Minimum deposit)The platform you are looking for is not listed? Contact us to request availability. Please note the prices listed above may be outdated, for the current prices you can refer to our website.We accept multiple payment methods.Bank transfers (SEPA and SWIFT – Worldwide)Credit cards (MasterCard, Visa, American Express)Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, Ethereum, Polkadot and Monero)PayPal* (Restrictions apply)*PayPal payments must be processed manually. Limitations apply; contact us for more information.Frequently Asked QuestionsHow much does it cost to get my profile verified?What are the benefits of being verified?How long does it take to get verified?What are the verification requirements?Is it safe to get verified?Visit the FAQ section on our website for more questions and answers.ContactsFeel free to message us using any of the contact methods listed below. Thank you.Email: hello@ormosis.comTelegram: @OrmosisBotDiscord: Ormosis#5344Live chat: ormosis.comBitcointalk users get a 10% discount on their first order. Simply post "DISCOUNT PLEASE" below and you will receive a PM containing your discount code.

comments.author: malcovi2
comments.body: $1k for the check mark in twitter while you can directly pay twitter for $8.

comments.author: Ormosisdotcom
comments.body: Quote from: malcovi2 on December 28, 2022, 10:54:32 AM$1k for the check mark in twitter while you can directly pay twitter for $8.    Purchasing Twitter Blue does not equal being verified on Twitter. There are reasons why companies decide to spend hundreds of dollars on social media verification.

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: Quote from: malcovi2 on December 28, 2022, 10:54:32 AM$1k for the check mark in twitter while you can directly pay twitter for $8.You have a very good point there, why waste my money when I could tap from the source directly? Also, the negative trust score of the OP is a huge call for concern. Everyone should be extremely careful.

comments.author: Ormosisdotcom
comments.body: Quote from: EarnOnVictor on December 28, 2022, 12:07:29 PMQuote from: malcovi2 on December 28, 2022, 10:54:32 AM$1k for the check mark in twitter while you can directly pay twitter for $8.You have a very good point there, why waste my money when I could tap from the source directly? Also, the negative trust score of the OP is a huge call for concern. Everyone should be extremely careful.The thread clearly states "we accept any trusted escrow or middleman as long as the buyer covers all fees". If a buyer decides to pay an escrow of his choice and the funds are not released until the service has been completed, what could possibly go wrong?As for the negative trust, if you merely click the "Trust" link you will notice they were given simply because we provide a review service. There is no connection between them and a specific deal. If you have any other questions or concerns I'm happy to address them for you. Nevertheless, if you were to carry out a simple Google search, you'd notice there stands a significant difference between Twitter verification status (which is not just a pretty blue badge) and Twitter Blue.

comments.author: malcovi2
comments.created_time: December 28, 2022, 11:01:47 PMLast edit: December 30, 2022, 11:13:55 PM by malcovi2
comments.body: Quote from: Ormosisdotcom on December 28, 2022, 12:52:21 PMQuote from: EarnOnVictor on December 28, 2022, 12:07:29 PMQuote from: malcovi2 on December 28, 2022, 10:54:32 AM$1k for the check mark in twitter while you can directly pay twitter for $8.You have a very good point there, why waste my money when I could tap from the source directly? Also, the negative trust score of the OP is a huge call for concern. Everyone should be extremely careful.The thread clearly states "we accept any trusted escrow or middleman as long as the buyer covers all fees". If a buyer decides to pay an escrow of his choice and the funds are not released until the service has been completed, what could possibly go wrong?As for the negative trust, if you merely click the "Trust" link you will notice they were given simply because we provide a review service. There is no connection between them and a specific deal. If you have any other questions or concerns I'm happy to address them for you. Nevertheless, if you were to carry out a simple Google search, you'd notice there stands a significant difference between Twitter verification status (which is not just a pretty blue badge) and Twitter Blue.https://help.twitter.com/en/using-twitter/twitter-blueTwitter Blue is our premium subscription service that elevates quality conversations on Twitter. Are you even aware that Twitter is doing a pay to get verified model?

comments.author: Ormosisdotcom
comments.body: Quote from: malcovi2 on December 28, 2022, 11:01:47 PMQuote from: Ormosisdotcom on December 28, 2022, 12:52:21 PMQuote from: EarnOnVictor on December 28, 2022, 12:07:29 PMQuote from: malcovi2 on December 28, 2022, 10:54:32 AM$1k for the check mark in twitter while you can directly pay twitter for $8.You have a very good point there, why waste my money when I could tap from the source directly? Also, the negative trust score of the OP is a huge call for concern. Everyone should be extremely careful.The thread clearly states "we accept any trusted escrow or middleman as long as the buyer covers all fees". If a buyer decides to pay an escrow of his choice and the funds are not released until the service has been completed, what could possibly go wrong?As for the negative trust, if you merely click the "Trust" link you will notice they were given simply because we provide a review service. There is no connection between them and a specific deal. If you have any other questions or concerns I'm happy to address them for you. Nevertheless, if you were to carry out a simple Google search, you'd notice there stands a significant difference between Twitter verification status (which is not just a pretty blue badge) and Twitter Blue.https://help.twitter.com/en/using-twitter/twitter-blueTwitter Blue is our premium subscription service that elevates quality conversations on Twitter. Are you even aware that Twitter is doing a pay to get verified model?The legacy verification policy is still active and it's not going anywhere. Rather than linking to Twitter's help center, I'm going to point you to Google, which has all the information you need. Furthermore, Twitter Blue and Twitter Blue for Business are still being rolled out as announced a week ago: https://business.twitter.com/en/blog/twitter-blue-for-business.htmlPrior to the new ownership, customers could only obtain a blue checkmark through our service. As of now, everyone who was previously verified but did not subscribe to Twitter Blue has a gray checkmark. Businesses that qualify can now apply for Twitter Blue for Business (which consists of a golden checkmark rather than a blue one).Currently, what we can do for our customers is enable them to apply for a golden checkmark even when they are not eligible. To be clear, there are requirements in place - roughly the same as with legacy verified accounts. We can provide more information on the service and its requirements to those who are actually interested.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: QuoteTwitter Verification Service: $999 (Minimum deposit)It costs $8 now per month to get the verification

comments.author: SMB
comments.created_time: January 17, 2023, 12:15:47 PMLast edit: January 17, 2023, 01:44:41 PM by SMB
comments.body: I am not A Newbie if you check my account age.If you are willing to do a VOUCH here on Bitcointalk , so we all know you are legit and to pay you afterwards is really not the problem.Got tons of clients for IG VerificationThere has been to many fake posts about these kinda Services trying to trick people.$500 is very very very cheap for an IG Blue TickI have seen your site and its pro but does not mean its all legit.Good luck if legit ofcourse.

comments.author: Ormosisdotcom
comments.body: Quote from: SMB on January 17, 2023, 12:15:47 PMI am not A Newbie if you check my account age.If you are willing to do a VOUCH here on Bitcointalk , so we all know you are legit and to pay you afterwards is really not the problem.Got tons of clients for IG VerificationThere has been to many fake posts about these kinda Services trying to trick people.$500 is very very very cheap for an IG Blue TickI have seen your site and its pro but does not mean its all legit.Good luck if legit ofcourse.   The prices you see on the website refer to the minimum deposit. No one could possibly provide an IG verification for $500. If someone claims they can, they are scammers.We accept any trusted escrow or middleman, as stated in the thread and multiple posts. That means we don't get paid until the client is satisfied and releases the money. If this is not enough to convince those who are interested in our services, please feel free to look for other sellers! Thank you.

comments.author: jack05
comments.body: Here are the detailed requirements to get a Twitter Blue Checkmark:QuoteYour account must meet the following criteria to receive or retain the blue checkmark: Complete: Your account must have a display name and profile photoActive use: Your account must be active in the past 30 days to subscribe to Twitter BlueSecurity: Your account must be older than 30 days upon subscription and have a confirmed phone numberNon-Deceptive:Your account must have no recent changes to your profile photo, display name, or username (@handle)Your account must have no signs of being misleading or deceptiveYour account must have no signs of engaging in platform manipulation and spamIn other words, you just need to have a normal account for more than a month and pay $8. Verification takes about 7 days.The case is different when it comes to the gold checkmark.I think you should correct your advert, because a lot of people can be confused that for service that cost $8 you want to charge $999.

comments.author: Ormosisdotcom
comments.body: Quote from: jack05 on April 15, 2023, 01:31:00 PMHere are the detailed requirements to get a Twitter Blue Checkmark:QuoteYour account must meet the following criteria to receive or retain the blue checkmark: Complete: Your account must have a display name and profile photoActive use: Your account must be active in the past 30 days to subscribe to Twitter BlueSecurity: Your account must be older than 30 days upon subscription and have a confirmed phone numberNon-Deceptive:Your account must have no recent changes to your profile photo, display name, or username (@handle)Your account must have no signs of being misleading or deceptiveYour account must have no signs of engaging in platform manipulation and spamIn other words, you just need to have a normal account for more than a month and pay $8. Verification takes about 7 days.The case is different when it comes to the gold checkmark.I think you should correct your advert, because a lot of people can be confused that for service that cost $8 you want to charge $999.This thread has been posted on December 28, 2022. That was before Twitter and Meta rolled out the paid verification plans. Moreover, you do not get the "Twitter Blue" verification that can easily be purchased off the platform when buying our service.If you simply click the link and visit the website, you will notice that our page for the Twitter verification service refers to the golden checkmark for businesses. If you did read the thread, you would also know that the $999 price merely refers to the minimum deposit.There are multiple reasons why companies and individuals are willing to pay $1k+ for such a service when they do not meet the official requirements. Therefore, there is no nothing that needs be corrected. Just to clarify, the thread clearly states: "Please note the prices listed above may be outdated, for the current prices you can refer to our website". Anyone who is actually interested should refer to the website for updated information.

comments.author: jack05
comments.body: Quote from: Ormosisdotcom on April 17, 2023, 06:12:29 AM..It's possible that your offer is for something else and is better explained on your website - I don't know, I haven't checked.What I wrote concerns the announcement from this thread, which clearly says in the topic: "BLUE CHECKMARK SERVICE". In text is info that required is a deposit of $999. (at the moment, the exact information is still in this thread)Of course, it's your thread and you can write whatever you want in it.

It’s easy for someone to pretend they are Brad Pitt’s new official profile and buy a few thousand fake followers. Internet users are aware of this and are constantly looking for clues that establish trust and give them the peace of mind and control they would have when talking with someone in person.It shows that your account is of interest to the public. This can open many doors to artists, freelancers and companies. People and businesses will most likely be more willing to contact you and collaborate with you once you are verified.-We support all the most popular platforms.
